Class CloudListManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.gamecomponents.CloudListManager
public class CloudListManager extends Object
Layout manager for the cloud list

    • CloudListManager

      public CloudListManager(javafx.scene.layout.Pane cloudListPane, javafx.beans.binding.ListExpression<Cloud> cloudList, javafx.beans.binding.BooleanExpression isInteractive, BiConsumer<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent,Integer> onCloudClick)
      Creates a new instance with the new parameters
      Parameters:
      cloudListPane - the Pane in which content will be injected
      cloudList - a ListExpression containing the list of clouds to represent
      isInteractive - a BooleanExpression indicating whether the layout should be interactive
      onCloudClick - a click handler for when a cloud has been clicked
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

  • Method Details

    • startManaging

      public void startManaging()
      Start reactively managing the layout.

      Note: the absence of a stopManaging() here is intentional. The lifecycle of each GameState object is as long as that of its view. Therefore, we have to worry only about internal cleanup between relayouts.

    • enableAndHighlightIfTrue

      private void enableAndHighlightIfTrue(javafx.scene.Node node, boolean val)
